casebody.data:
Third Department,

September, 1942.

(September 16, 1942.) In the Matter of the Application of Robert W. Thompson, Petitioner, for an Order Reviewing a Determination as to Petitioner’s Income Tax Liability for the Calendar Years 1936 and 1937, against Mark Graves and Others, as and Constituting the State Tax Commission of the State of New York, Respondents.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Hill, P. J., Crapser, Hefiernan, Schenck and Foster, JJ.
